dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Purpose
dataset_fields.help_text: A description of the purpose of this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Place of publication
dataset_fields.help_text: The pubPlace field is the location where the resource was published, which may be different from where the resource was created.

dataset_fields.label: Change Scope
dataset_fields.help_text: The expression should unambiguously identify the entity(s) and attribute(s) that were changed.

dataset_fields.label: Old Value
dataset_fields.help_text: The previous value or an expression that describes the previous value of the data.

dataset_fields.label: Change Date
dataset_fields.help_text: The date the changes were applied.

dataset_fields.label: Comment
dataset_fields.help_text: Explanation or justification for the change made to the data.

dataset_fields.label: Organization Name
dataset_fields.help_text: The responsible party field contains the full name of the organization that is associated with the resource. This field is intended to describe which institution or overall organization is associated with the resource being described.

dataset_fields.label: Position Name
dataset_fields.help_text: This field is intended to be used instead of a particular person or full organization name. If the associated person who holds the role changes frequently, then Position Name would be used for consistency.

dataset_fields.label: URL
dataset_fields.help_text: A link to associated online information, usually a web site. When the party represents an organization, this is the URL to a website or other online information about the organization. If the party is an individual, it might be their personal web site or other related online information about the party.

dataset_fields.label: User Id
dataset_fields.help_text: An identifier that links this party to a directory of personnel. Although specific contact information for a party might change, the underlying correspondence to a real individual does not. This identifier provides a pointer within a personnel directory that may contain further, and possibly more current, information about the party.

dataset_fields.label: Salutation
dataset_fields.help_text: The salutation field is used in addressing an individual with a particular title, such as Dr., Ms., Mrs., Mr., etc.

dataset_fields.label: Delivery Point
dataset_fields.help_text: The delivery point field is used for the physical address for postal communication. This field is used to accommodate the many different international conventions that are the equivalent to a U.S. 'street address'.

dataset_fields.label: Method Step
dataset_fields.help_text: The methodStep field allows for repeated sets of elements that document a series of procedures followed to produce a data object. These include text descriptions of the procedures, relevant literature, software, instrumentation, source data and any quality control measures taken.

dataset_fields.label: Sampling
dataset_fields.help_text: Description of sampling procedures including the geographic, temporal and taxonomic coverage of the study.

dataset_fields.label: Quality Control
dataset_fields.help_text: The qualityControl field provides a location for the description of actions taken to either control or assess the quality of data resulting from the associated method step. A quality control description should identify a quality goal and describe prescriptive steps taken to ensure that the data meet those standards and/or postscriptive steps taken to assess the extent to which they are met. A quality control statement is associated with the methodStep that could have affected the targeted quality goal.

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data
